first_story_block: eat some preserved fruits and vegetables

action_results.action: You delight it some pickled okra and some peach preserves. You think about bringing some food with you, but it will be too heavy for travel. So you try to eat as much as you can now. You decide to have some for the morning as well. It's getting late and with your full belly you are feeling quite tired. You can reenter the farmhouse or sleep in the shed.
action_results.result: stay in the shed

action_results.action: You remembered the noise you heard early and decide to holed up in the shed.
action_results.result: find a place in the shed to relax

action_results.action: You use your hands to guide you around the space. Just past the preserved goods on the shelves there seems to be a small rug that is folded.
action_results.result: adjust the rug to lay on it

action_results.action: As you kneel down to adjust the rug your hand touches something cold and metal-like.
action_results.result: access the metal object

action_results.action: It seems to be a large metallic ring connected to the floor.
action_results.result: pull the ring

action_results.action: The floor lifts slightly and a dusty smell wafts out.
action_results.result: shut the hatch back

action_results.action: It seems to be a hatch that leads to an underground area like a cellar or bunker.
action_results.result: open the hatch again

action_results.action: You open up the hatch again but a little wider and stick your head in a bit. It's too dark to see anything. All you can do is smell the muskiness of whatever is below.
action_results.result: close the hatch and resume to try to sleep

action_results.action: You lay on the small rug and try to get comfortable. You hold yourself and try to get a grasp on reality before fading to sleep.
action_results.result: wake up

action_results.action: You awaken to some sunlight beams leaking in through the shed. You stretch and yawn as you look at the jars of preserves.
wake up
action_results.result: Warm light streams through cracks of the old farm house you open your eyes and stretch. As you lean up to sit something warm and fuzzy rolls down your arm.

action_results.action: jump up
action_results.result: You spring off the hay the and turn to look at a slightly alarmed cat. It stares at you solemnly.

action_results.action: pet the cat
action_results.result: You slowly reach out to pet the cat. It's a bit hesitant but allows you to pet it.

action_results.action: cuddle the cat
action_results.result: It's been awhile since you've been able to give and receive some affection. The cat is so sweet and kind. You notice it has some patches of fur missing and only has three legs. Although it has no open wounds. You then hear your stomach growl.

action_results.action: head to the shed to eat
action_results.result: You begin to walk towards the ladder to go back to the bottom floor. You avoid the old hook and climb down the ladder. As you begin to head towards the window you hear the cat meow. It looks down at you from above.

action_results.action: tell the cat to come down
action_results.result: You make encouraging noises and words at the cat so it will come with you. It doesn't move. It watches you stoically from above.

action_results.action: leave the through the window
action_results.result: You climb out through the window and head towards the shed. When you enter the shed you notice there are some jars missing.

action_results.action: scan area
action_results.result: You step out the shed for a moment and look around. You don't see anyone or anything. Maybe your mind is playing tricks on you.

action_results.action: head back to the shed
action_results.result: You turn around and the lovely three-legged cat approaches you. You pet it and head back into the shed.

action_results.action: eat some preserves
action_results.result: You open some preserved pumpkin and begin to eat it. The cat meows at you. It must be hungry too. You place some pumpkin on the ground for it to eat. It makes delightful eating noises. You get back to eating and suddenly you hear some shuffling coming from somewhere... beneath you?
